results.title: A Series of 211 Children with Probable Essential Tremor.
results.text_hl: Fifty-five percent of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had @<m>DISEASE_Conversion_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003291 @@@functional disabilities@@@, including writing (n = 66), eating (n = 28) drinking from a cup (n = 13), typing (n = 4), playing instruments (n = 6), buttoning (n = 6), and playing (n = 3).

citations.NLM: Ghosh D, Brar H, Lhamu U, Rothner AD, Erenberg G. A Series of 211 Children with Probable Essential Tremor. Mov Disord Clin Pract. 2017 Mar-Apr;4(2):231-236. PMID: 30363473
